H0.text: In 1171 Henry II was the first English king to set foot in an Irish city. Founded by the Vikings in the ninth century, which is Ireland's oldest city. Dublin

H1.text: In 1171 Henry II was the first English king to set foot in an Irish city. Founded by the Vikings in the ninth century, which is Ireland's oldest city. Limerick

H2.text: In 1171 Henry II was the first English king to set foot in an Irish city. Founded by the Vikings in the ninth century, which is Ireland's oldest city. Cork

H3.text: In 1171 Henry II was the first English king to set foot in an Irish city. Founded by the Vikings in the ninth century, which is Ireland's oldest city. WATERFORD

A4.text: Viking raiders first established a settlement near Waterford in 853.

A5.text: Waterford is the oldest and the fifth most populous city in the Republic of Ireland.
